name: Snow Bros Jump2
description:
The Legend of the arcade game. A supplementary story of Snow Bros !!

1. No More Boring Jump! Now it’s Time to Jump and SHOOT.

2. Foster Various Characters, Each Has Different Abilities. Characters Will Be Updated Regularly.

3. The More Levels You Get, The Stronger Your Character Becomes.

4. Characteristic Super Jump! Do Exciting Perpendicular Ascent!!
